pr_title: fix: Moved KubernetesClient implementation of `kubectl run` to separa…

timeline.bodyText: Did you forget to add this NO SONAR comment?
timeline.author: dev-gaur

replies.bodyText:
It's on purpose. It removes a Sonar reported code smell (constructor with too many args).
I will replace with @SupressWarnings squid annotation. I guess today I woke up with a JavaScript mindset 😅
replies.author: manusa

timeline.message: fix: Moved KubernetesClient implementation of `kubectl run` to separate package
